title: Repository Paths Schema
description: Schema for defining repository paths for Git Migration Modeler

repositoryPaths.title: Repository Paths configuration
repositoryPaths.description: List of repository paths configurations defining the filter criteria and input parameters to the Git Migration Modeler for generating the DBB Git Migration Mapping files and the initial version of the Application Descriptor.

repositoryPath.title: The path of the repository
repositoryPath.description: Relative path within the git repository structure for matching files.

artifactsType.title: The type of artifacts in the repository
artifactsType.description: The type of artifacts under this group.

sourceGroup.title: The name of the source group
sourceGroup.description: The name of the source group record, that is created within the Application Descriptor.

language.title: The programming language used in the repository
language.description: Name of the programming language that is used for this group. Informational purpose only.

languageProcessor.title: The language processor used for processing the language
languageProcessor.description: Corresponding language processor for this group.  Informational purpose only. Not used by any automation tasks.

fileExtension.title: The file extension used in the repository
fileExtension.description: File extension used for generating DBB Migration Mapping files.

toLowerCase.title: Flag indicating whether to convert all characters to lowercase
toLowerCase.description: Flag controlling the capitalization of files names in the z/OS Unix System services target folders. Used for generating DBB Migration Mapping files

encoding.title: The encoding used in the repository
encoding.description: Specify the z/OS file ebcdic encoding. Used for generating DBB Migration Mapping files

mvsMapping.title: Criteria for mapping members from PDS input libraries to this repositoryPath configuration.

datasetLastLevelQualifiers.title: Match according to the last level qualifiers for MVS datasets
datasetLastLevelQualifiers.description: Filter based on the last level qualifiers from the input datasets for Migration Modeler.

scan.title: Match according to DBB scanner classification
scan.description: Filter based on the results of the DBB classification scanner.

fileType.description: The file type used for scanning

types.title: Match according to the legacy types.
types.description: Filter based on the referenced legacy types specified for a files in the types.txt file
